meanings.sent1: She exerts herself in her studies every day.

meanings.definition: To apply or bring to bear
meanings.sent1: He exerts pressure on the wound to stop the bleeding.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic exerts force to loosen the tight bolt.
meanings.sent3: The chef exerts care in adding the perfect amount of seasoning to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The teacher exerts authority to maintain discipline in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The detective exerts his skills to solve the mystery.
